solution_line_template: Three times the number of Doberman puppies is {multiplier_three}*{num_doberman_puppies}=<<{multiplier_three}*{num_doberman_puppies}={three_times_doberman}>>{three_times_doberman}
Five less than three times the number of Doberman puppies is {three_times_doberman}-{five_less}=<<{three_times_doberman}-{five_less}={five_less_three_times}>>{five_less_three_times}
